matches.item_name: Auto - Ideal Car Mechanic and Auto Repair Template for WordPress

conversation.content:
Hi,

Can you make the project image gallery into a slider and not displaying all the images down the right hand side??

Thanks

Out of the box, Unfortunately no.

It can be done but with customization of the theme. If you are interested in costumization please write to us on http://support.proteusthemes.com/
